response_parsed.title: Unit Testing FastAPI REST APIs with Python 3.12+
response_parsed.summary: This guide provides a comprehensive overview on how to unit test REST APIs built using FastAPI in Python 3.12+. We will cover setting up tests, key points, code examples, version notes, and caveats.

code_examples.code:
from fastapi.testclient import TestClient

client = TestClient("http://localhost:8000")
response = client.get("/items/")

version_notes.note: FastAPI 3.12.0 introduces several improvements, such as better error handling and performance optimizations.
It is recommended to use pytest v7.1.2 or higher for testing FastAPI applications in Python 3.12+

caveats: FastAPI tests may become complex when dealing with databases and external APIs.
Mocking external dependencies can help simplify tests but might lead to brittle tests if not done correctly.
